entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Periods of light snow beginning this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022
